model.name: PERSONS
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW PERSONS ( ID string(64) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), FIRSTNAME string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), LASTNAME string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), SEX char(1) OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(ID, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME) ) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'TRUE') AS SELECT * FROM PERSONS_VBL.PERSONS;

model.name: PERSONS_VBL
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW PERSONS ( ID string(64) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), FIRSTNAME string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), LASTNAME string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), SEX char(1) OPTIONS(NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(ID, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME) ) OPTIONS(UPDATABLE 'TRUE') AS SELECT * FROM PERSONS_DS.PERSONS;

model.name: PERSONS_DS
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE PERSONS ( ID string(64) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`ID`', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), FIRSTNAME string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`FIRSTNAME`', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), LASTNAME string(50) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`LASTNAME`', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), SEX char(1) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`SEX`', NATIVE_TYPE 'CHAR', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), CONSTRAINT "PRIMARY" PRIMARY KEY(ID, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`PRIMARY`') ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '`RHTE`.`PERSONS`', UPDATABLE 'TRUE');
